            Ruminations of a confused data scientist, days when I
            feel like a datascientst but really love doing engineering
            and on other days data engineering.
            This blog is about the intresting things I’m learning
            along with friends at work and otherwise.
            
            Experience
            Lead Data Scientist | Eka.care |
            Bangalore, India
            (June’24 - Present)
            Senior Data Scientist | Eka.care |
            Bangalore, India
            (Jan’22 - April’24)
            Data Scientist | Udaan | Bangalore,
            India
            (May’21 - Dec’21)
            Data Scientist - III | SigTuple |
            Bangalore, India
            (May’18 - May’21)
            
            
            Education
            VIT University | Vellore, India
            BTech Computer Science | 2014 - 2018
